coverage_details.checkup: Not Covered (General check up for all employees and spouses up to 3,500)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR2,500.00; frames are covered up to optical limit; contact lenses covered; anti-reflection lenses covered; optical covered without age limit.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Kidney only, SR 250,000.00; Donor organ harvesting SR 50,000.00
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 10,000.00; Deductible: Nil; Dental limit is considered as one limit for corrective & emergency; Scaling covered twice a year; Crowns and bridges covered; Teeth whitening covered.
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit; including coverage to newborns delivered prior to policy up to 30,000.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,500.00; frames and contact lenses covered; anti-reflection lenses covered; optical covered without age limit.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation approval required for VVIP and Parent VVIP schemes; No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient services (except for outpatient services with special limits and for hearing aids, optics, maternity, insulin needles, kidney aids, blood sugar test strips, gauze or bandages, crutches, and sugar reading devices).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Ear Piercing up to SR 300; Artificial limbs covered up to annual limit; Joint replacement (knee, artificial limbs) covered; Speech therapy covered; Free-style libre (glucose monitor) covered; Coverage includes insulin needles, blood sugar test strips, medical swabs, medical gauze, crutches, all sugar reading devices (CGM, Free-style); Scaling covered twice a year; General checkup for employees and spouses up to SR 3,500; Keratoconus operation covered (except transplant); Coverage for newborns and congenital illnesses delivered prior to policy up to SR 30,000; Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit; Dental limit covers corrective & emergency; Crowns, bridges, and whitening covered.
